refnamediv.refpurpose: Create blob, copy file in it, and close it

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
stringibase_blob_import resourcelink_identifier resourcefile_handle
stringibase_blob_import resourcefile_handle
This function creates a BLOB, reads an entire file into it, closes it and returns the assigned BLOB id.

&reftitle.parameters;
link_identifier
An InterBase link identifier. If omitted, the last opened link is assumed.
file_handle
The file handle is a handle returned by fopen.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the BLOB id on success, or &false; on error.
